testcase.name: HamcrestJsonValidation

failure.message:
Expected: The content to match the given JSON schema. error: object has missing required properties (["DeliveredTime"]) level: "error" schema: {"loadingURI":"#","pointer":""} instance: {"pointer":""} domain: "validation" keyword: "required" required: ["BranchId","DeliveredTime","FoodOrder","OrderTime","RestaurantName"] missing: ["DeliveredTime"]
but: was "{
 "RestaurantName": "SS Hyderbad Biriyani",
 "BranchId": 123,
 "FoodOrder": [
 "2 Chicken Biriyani",
 "1 Chicken Grill",
 "2 Fish Fry"
 ],
 "OrderTime": "12:45 pm"
 
}"
